item.title: Brandi add a quote by Denis Johnson
item.description: "And you, you ridiculous people, you expect me to help you." -- Denis Johnson

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Kenneth Koch
item.description: "Maybe poetry took the life out of both of them, Idea and friendship." -- Kenneth Koch

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Frank O'Hara
item.description: "That's not a run in your stocking, it's a hand on your leg." -- Frank O'Hara

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Ted Berrigan
item.description: "In Chicago, Illinois, you / are really at home / whether you like it or not, baby, / &, whether you like it / or not / You Are My Friend / so don't pees me off!" -- Ted Berrigan

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You must stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Tina Brown Celona
item.description: "Despite everything I go on succeeding." -- Tina Brown Celona

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Tina Brown Celona
item.description: "By the fur of Maurice the dog I love you." -- Tina Brown Celona

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Tina Brown Celona
item.description: "I want to fight myself with all my arms against all my arms." -- Tina Brown Celona

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Live to the point of tears." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "There is but one truly serious philosophical problem and that is suicide. Judging whether life is or is not worth living amounts to answering the fundamental question of philosophy. All the rest — whether or not the world has three dimensions, whether the mind has nine or twelve categories — comes afterwards. These are games; one must first answer." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Brandi add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Strange children should smile at each other and say, "Let's play." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Edna St. Vincent Millay
item.description: "There is no shelter in you anywhere." -- Edna St. Vincent Millay

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Peggy Munson
item.description: "I would like to know just what kind of nothing I am" -- Peggy Munson

item.title: Brandi add a quote by John Donne
item.description: "I am two fools, I know, For loving, and for saying so." -- John Donne

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Edna St. Vincent Millay
item.description: "Soar, eat ether, see what has never been seen; depart, be lost, but climb." -- Edna St. Vincent Millay

item.title: Brandi add a quote by Michelle Tea
item.description: "it just breaks / a man's heart, watching / a girl so involved with her life, / without him like that." -- Michelle Tea
